alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Laramie Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Albany, northwestern Laramie, Platte and south central Converse Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harris Park to near Iron Mountain. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Chugwater, Chugcreek, Esterbrook, Lakeview North, Sibley Peak, Bordeaux, Westview Circle, Y-O Ranch, Friend Park Campground, Two Moon Campground, Laramie Peak, Esterbrook Campground, Iron Mountain, Whitaker, Slater, Guernsey Campground, Glendo Reservoir and Harris Park. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 27 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
